params.opener: The address of the user that opened the lootbox

claimRewards(address).details: The user must have a pending open request and the randomness must be fulfilled

params.opener: The address of the user that opened the lootbox and will receive the rewards

params.amountDistributedPerOpen: The amount of reward units that are distributed per open
params.feePerOpen: The fee that is charged per open
params.openStartTimestamp: The timestamp after which the lootbox can be opened
params.perUnitAmounts: The amount of each token that is distributed per reward unit
params.tokens: The tokens that will be transferred to the lootbox
params.vrfCoordinatorV2: The address of the Chainlink VRF coordinator V2
params.vrfKeyHash: The key hash for Chainlink VRF
params.vrfSubscriptionId: The subscription ID for Chainlink VRF
params.whitelistRoot: The merkle root of the whitelist for the private openning. If the root is 0x0, the lootbox is set in public open mode.

returns.perUnitAmounts: The amount of each token that is distributed per reward unit

params.opener: The address of the user that opened the lootbox

returns._0: requestId The ID of the request

privateOpen(uint64,bytes32[]).details: The user must be in the whitelist merkle treeTo generate the merkle proof, see https://github.com/merkletreejs/merkletreejs

params.amountToOpen: The amount of lootbox units to open
params.merkleProof: The merkle proof for the user's address

params.amountToOpen: The amount of lootbox units to open

params.privateOpenEnabled: Whether the private openning mode is enabled

setWhitelistRoot(bytes32).details: To generate the merkle tree, see https://github.com/merkletreejs/merkletreejs

params.whiteListRoot: The hash of the whitelist merkle tree root

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

canClaimRewards(address).notice: Returns whether the rewards for the given opener can be claimed

claimRewards(address).notice: Claims the rewards for the lootbox openning

constructor.notice: Deploys a new Lootbox contract with the given parameters

getLootboxTokens().notice: Returns the tokens and amounts per unit of the lootbox

getRequestIdOf(address).notice: Get the request ID of the given opener

privateOpen(uint64,bytes32[]).notice: Requests a lootbox openning when the lootbox is in private open mode

publicOpen(uint64).notice: Requests a lootbox openning when the lootbox is in public open mode

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

setPrivateOpen(bool).notice: Enable or disable the private openning mode

setWhitelistRoot(bytes32).notice: Set the whitelist merkle tree root for the private openning

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.

withdraw().notice: Transfer the contract balance to the owner
